sentences.sContent: She dusted all the books on the bookshelf.
sentences.sContent_eng: She dusted all the books on the bookshelf.
sentences.sCn: 她把书架上所有书上的灰尘都掸干净。

sentences.sContent: The book you gave me is now on the bookshelf.
sentences.sContent_eng: The book you gave me is now on the bookshelf.
sentences.sCn: 你给我的那本书现在在书架上。

sentences.sContent: His books were ranked tidily on the bookshelf.
sentences.sContent_eng: His books were ranked tidily on the bookshelf.
sentences.sCn: 他的书籍整整齐齐地排列在书架上。

trans.tranOther: a shelf that you keep books on, or a piece of furniture used for holding books
